column5: I went out yesterday evening to see if I could get some Shad for catfish bait, I found tons after getting about 7 I put a lure on and started casting but almost every cast I either caught a fish or snagged one. I snagged a pretty good size pike and a few carp, I also got a few nice white bass and my first carp on a X-rap.  The sucker seem to have gone, will they come back?
You can't be that disappointed with carp and white bass on every cast! Even more so for when pike season rolls in!
